metadata.name: Neon Symphony | ネオンシンフォニー
metadata.description:
Neon rain falls softly in the night,  
A symphony of color, an electric light,  
Tokyo's streets alive with vibrant hues,  
A dazzling display, impossible to refuse.

The rhythm of the city, a pulsing beat,  
As neon signs and streetlights compete,  
A symphony of sound, a dazzling array,  
Tokyo at night, an unforgettable display.

Amidst the rain, a symphony of light,  
A feast for the senses, a mesmerizing sight,  
Tokyo at night, a neon wonderland,  
A symphony of beauty, forever grand.

By: Ilan Derech  
Collaboration with: FIF - Cannes Film Festival  
Location: Tokyo, Japan  
Shot on: Leica Q2  
Year: 2023
